00011 void ntos(char *buf, int n)
00012 {
00013   buf[0] = ((unsigned int)n >> 24) & 0xFF;
00014   buf[1] = ((unsigned int)n >> 16) & 0xFF;
00015   buf[2] = ((unsigned int)n >> 8) & 0xFF;
00016   buf[3] = (unsigned int)n & 0xFF;
00017 }
00018 
00020 int ston(char *buf)
00021 {
00022   return ((unsigned char)buf[0] << 24) | ((unsigned char)buf[1] << 16) | ((unsigned char)buf[2] << 8) | (unsigned char)buf[3];
00023 }

00026 void dumphex(const char *buf, int len)
00027 {
00028   for (int i = 0; i < len; i++)
00029     printf("%2.2hhX ", buf[i]);
00030   printf("\n");
00031 }

00033 void banner(const char *text)
00034 {
00035   int i;
00036 
00037   printf("\n/");
00038 
00039   for (i = 0; i < 78; i++)
00040     putchar('*');
00041 
00042   printf("\\\n *%76s*\n * %-75s*\n *%76s*\n\\", "", text, "");
00043 
00044   for (i = 0; i < 78; i++)
00045     putchar('*');
00046

00050 void todo(const char *file, int line, const char *text)
00051 {
00052   printf("\n** TODO: %s in file %s at line %d\n\n", text, file, line);
